retweeted_status.full_text: SHiFT Services will be taken offline for scheduled maintenance on June 16 at 7am PT/10am ET. We estimate that this will last for 5 hours. For the duration, affected Borderlands players on PC will not have access to hotfixes, matchmaking, or in-game player mail.

user.name: SHiFT Status
user.description: SHiFT is our way to reward fans like you with bonus items and other in-game goodies. For support, visit http://t.co/F9nOQCHbGH
